Reviews.Title: Neat little Point and Shot
Reviews.Author: comengetit
Reviews.Content: This camera has all the features of a high end camera with a very low price tag.The only negative is is 5xZoom to take pictures far away, but everything else makes up for that. The resolution is great 1280-720 and shots 30 frames a second. Upgradable memory to 64gb and very slim design. Large screen and wide angle F2.5.This is a really neat little camera and I give it 4.5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Excellent little camera
Reviews.Author: Winfield S. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I had another Samsung digital camera, which was a few years old and stopped working.  I purchased this model, and I love it.  It is small and slim, but with a nice big lcd screen.  The controls are easy to use, except that I wish the on/off button was a tad larger.  Picture quality is fine.  I also enjoy the hd video capabilty.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera with Great Features
Reviews.Author: Ashton Jah "ashtonjah96"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. It is defenitaly not worth the price that it is. It seemes like it should be $160.00. Great Camera, Stored Camera Edititing, Live Panorama,Double Image Great Gallery and Great Images! Cheap and good. It is pretty much self explanitory and it has a little help thing so when you have the select over it it will tell you what it can do. Great camera for photography, nature and wildlife and Great Camera. Looking for a cheap camera i would get this one! Samsung makes great cameras!

Reviews.Title: Samsung ST72 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I too purchased this camera at Walmart only because I was able to actually pick it up and look at it with my eyes, something that is a bit difficult to do when ordering online. The sales person made me aware that I needed to purchase the memory card separately.  So even for $89.99 at Walmart, it was still a great deal even having to purchase the memory card separately for $17 bucks.  This is actually a really fantastic camera.  I own a Canon that is of similar quality, however, the Samsung has more features for a better price.  Now I will be purchasing a second one for my son for Christmas through Amazon because I'm confident of the quality and the reliability of Samsung.  Amazon's price is also cheaper for the same camera sold at Walmart.

Reviews.Title: Excellent little camera, high quality.
Reviews.Author: david m bencic
Reviews.Content: Just got one from W..... for $79.  If you want a thin camera to put in your purse or shirt pocket, this is nice.  Photo quality is excellent, video quality is excellent, good sound too.  Here are my comments that may help you:  Flash takes 3 seconds to charge up after each flash.  You need to go to a few steps to turn flash on-off but no big problem.  I leave it on fill-in all the time.  No flash is almost the same time between pictures, 2-3 seconds on normal mode.  Shutter time is fast after you push the button, no significant delay.  If you press it slightly, it will focus, then when you are ready, press it down and it is almost instant.  The 2 INCH macro is great, can see fibers in the paper or cloth.  Focusing is fast.  In AF auto focus, it constantly searches and focuses so I like to keep it in P program mode then it only focuses when you partly press the shutter.  Uses the same mini plug and charger as my LG phone and charges on USB ports.  Includes a charger and USB cord.  The charger can power any USB device too.  Fits nice in a zip lock snack baggie if you will get wet.  HINTS:  Do NOT buy a red one, the white symbols and words on the red dials are hard to read.  When doing video, do not move or pan the camera, hold it still and let the subjects move or pan REAL slow  (true for any camera).  If you move the camera and pan, it tries to stay in focus and things get blurred some, if your subject is a kid and you pan to the next kid, it will refocus on the space between them then blurr the kids.  Not the camera's fault.  Yes, I would recommend this camera but not red.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera at a good price.
Reviews.Author: Richard Tauer
Reviews.Content: It is very compact, has a good lens, and it is easy to see images on the screen even in bright light. This last is very important.

Reviews.Title: Simple & Efficient
Reviews.Author: chris schieren
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera about 1 week before my family trip to WDW this year. The shipping was quick (thankfully) and the price was great. I had recently broken my Canon and this was a last minute replacement. This is a good camera for quick snapshots and is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Barb Daniels
Reviews.Content: Nice camera with alot of features.  Sharp pictures and zoom lens.  I really like my camera that the whole family can use.

Reviews.Title: new camera
Reviews.Author: joel cadogan
Reviews.Content: this camera works really good. what i like about it is that it's really neat its not bulky. the display screen is good size, the flash is great, it as face detection, the pictures are really nice quality.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Maria Nunn
Reviews.Content: For the price its excellent!  Very clear crisp pictures - lots of fun functions - Very easy to understand and use! I've had other cameras in same price range that had way poorer quality and broke down really easily. Best camera so far I've seen in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Lots of fun!
Reviews.Author: Debra L. Collier
Reviews.Content: Small & easy to carry. Plenty of options on the menu.  The frames make it lots of fun to create fun memories!

Reviews.Title: Takes good picture but size makes it bit shaky for me
Reviews.Author: K. DESAI
Reviews.Content: It is very small and often trying to take picture quickly, I see some shakiness. It is probably me.  Good and bad, cannot use regular AA batteries so if yo run out of charge while yo are out you cannot take picture.  The low power sign comes before 10 or 12 snaps. I would prefer some warning when it is 25% power left.

Reviews.Title: Good quality, ease of use
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday present for my father in law, as he was using some 90's camcorder. He has loved this camera all the way from its picture quality to ease of transferring files to his PC (Which was a struggling point of the old device). Highly recommended for photo enthusiasts and those who have a difficult time with the transferring of photos to the PC.

Reviews.Title: son really enjoing it
Reviews.Author: mistertx
Reviews.Content: Tjhis is a gresat little camera for a great price. i bought it for my 12 year old son and he loves it, There are a lot of different picture options, and the pictures are nice.. It' scompact eyta has a large enough screen to view his photos comfortably. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: McCabe Wagner
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend for anyone needing a simple camera. The auto function selects which mode works best for the shot you are trying to take perfectly. It also has panoramic capabilities, which is awesome. Pictures look fantastic. Love this camera.

Reviews.Title: This was a gift and she absolutely loved it..
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality..Small and very easily portable..Quick and responsive..Shes not very technical but she found this very easy to use..

Reviews.Title: this is a really great camera!
Reviews.Author: cHrystal21
Reviews.Content: this is a really great camera! i love how compact it is, yet there is a really big screen. there are a lot of different ways you can distort or change the pictures, but i cannot find a sepia or black and white feture.also the box it comes in is TINY, there is no manual that comes in the box you have to upload it.and if you have a regular memory card, it wont fit. this camera takes the mirco memory card (the same as your smartphone).so i'm giving it 4 and not 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Lots of features for the price.
Reviews.Author: jjack929
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, nice clear pictures, also does videos so it's a camcorder to boot.  Beats those blurry photos your cell phone takes.  Has a ton of extras I haven't even looked at yet.

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift for 80th birthday
Reviews.Author: Earline McGrannahan
Reviews.Content: Perfect size and easy operating for my 80 year old mother.  LCD screen is just right for her. She loves it

Reviews.Author: bonnie smith
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this camera at Wal-Mart.  Looks fancy. sleek.  Then I charged it, took 2 photos, then the camera said "Memory Full"....really???  for $89+ tax I would assume that I would have a full memory cartridge.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.2MP 1/2.3" CCD Image Sensor
Samsung 5x Optical Zoom Lens
35mm Equivalent Focal Length: 25-125mm
3.0" 230k-Dot TFT-LCD Monitor
HD 720p Video Recording at 30fps
Digital Image Stabilization
Smart Auto and Smart Filter Modes
Live Panorama and Motion Photo
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST72 16.2MP 3-inch TFT LCD Digital Camera (Black)
